overview.title: Overview
overview.description: Welcome to Loopus & Maintain - where we maintain buildings and crack dad jokes! Our PWA helps coordinate maintenance services, because someone has to keep those buildings standing (and we're pretty good at it) 🏗️

features.title: Current Features
features.auth: 🔐 Secure admin login (we promise it's not "password123")
features.email: 📧 Email management system (because carrier pigeons are so last century)
features.content: 📝 Content management with fallback database (for those "oops, no internet" moments)
features.business: 💼 Business management features (keeping track of who does what)
features.documents: 📂 Document storage with Dropbox integration (because paper is so 2019)
features.languages: 🌐 Multi-language support (we speak human... and JavaScript)
